text: For example, the references Δ, Й, ק, م, ๗, あ, 叶, 葉, and 냻 (or the same numeric values expressed in hexadecimal, with &#x as the prefix) display on browsers as Δ, Й, ק,? م, ๗, あ, 叶, 葉 and 냻— if the proper fonts exist, these symbols look like the Greek capital letter "Delta", Cyrillic capital letter "Short I", Hebrew letter "Qof", Arabic letter "Meem", Thai numeral 7, Japanese Hiragana "A", simplified Chinese "Leaf", traditional Chinese "Leaf", and Korean Hangul syllable "Nyaelh", respectively
